alert.note: Alert for Allen; Avoyelles; Evangeline; Rapides; St. Landry; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 11:50AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Rapides, Evangeline, Avoyelles, northeastern St. Landry, east central Vernon and eastern Allen Parishes through 1215 PM CDT... At 1150 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Palmetto to near Oberlin. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oakdale, Ville Platte, Marksville, Bunkie, Mamou, Simmesport, Oberlin, Glenmora, Melville, Moreauville, Cheneyville, Elizabeth, Turkey Creek, Palmetto, Bordelonville, Bayou Current, Morrow, Cottonport, Pine Prairie and Mansura. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 23 and 71. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Avoyelles; Evangeline; Rapides; St. Landry; Vernon
